text: Atterton is a hamlet in Leicestershire, England. OS Explorer Map 232 : Nuneaton & Tamworth: (1:25 000) : It has a population of approximately 40 people. ==Governance== Atterton is part of the civil parish of Witherley that, in turn, forms part of the borough of Hinckley and Bosworth.County council ==References== Category:Hamlets in Leicestershire Category:Hinckley and Bosworth
title: Atterton
